name:
Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL®
World Duel Carnival
description:
Enter the World Duel Carnival and
compete against 40 opponents from
the Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal universe. Defeat
them all to be crowned champion.
Each playable character has their own
unique deck allowing players to jump
straight into the action while more
experienced player can build their own
from a pool of over 5,500 cards. For
new players there is an easy mode
and tutorial to guide them through the
basic rules and techniques.
